title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Resources
description: Coronavirus (COVID-19) information and resources for UC San Diego School of Medicine applicants, students, and employees
cleaned_text: UC San Diego and UC San Diego Health leadership are working closely with federal and state officials to help slow the spread of COVID-19. For the most up-to-date guidance on health and safety, please visit the [U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention website.](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html)
